reviewText: Polly : The Wonderful World of Disneyyippee.this disney movie is a classic retelling of the story pollyanna. polly played by keisha knight pulliam shows she has a wonderful generous heart surely missed in todays world.the music is first rate along with the singing.i recomend this dvd to any disney or musical fan.an excellent disc.

Here is a great movie, with a message against  prejudice that is definitly not hidden. There are some nice songs and dance, and it was wonderful to have all the original characters back! Only one song could I have done without called "Hot Lanta" which was a little racey for kids, but the rest was very good. It is about time this movie is on DVD.

I too have looked for this movie for YEARS and have requested though Disney movie club for this movie to be released numerous. Once again on my search for the movie i came across these reviews and thanks so much to the lady who mentioned it was avail through Disney movie club!!!!

I have been waiting for YEARS for them to put this movie on DVD! This is such a feel-good movie that I'm surprised it has taken them this long. Although it is not well known, this African-Americanized version of the story of Pollyanna is one of the most uplifting films Disney has made. It's light-hearted songs and emotional storyline make you feel, when you come out at the other end, that this movie has truly touched you. Plus, who can help but love the songs? From "Stand Up!" (my personal favorite...I still sing it around the house) to "Angel Eyes" to "Shine a Light", the music in this film is unforgettable. Worth getting just to relive the magic and the memories! I'm buying my copy today!

Polly has got to be one of my all time favorite movies.  I can recite the movie from beginnning to end just like "The Color Purple" and "Coming to America". BUT...I cannot believe Amazon has this movie on sale for almost $40.  I just ordered it for $1.99...yes $1.99 from the DisneyMovieClub. Of course I had to become a member.  But for this movie...it was worth it.

I have been waiting literally years for disney to put this title out and I am so happy they did. I remember watching this film Polly, and Polly: Comin' Home when I was a little girl and after watching it as a adult I still love it just as much. I am proud to show this movie to my daughter and other people who just enjoy quality black films. This film has class a class you rarely see these days in black entertainment that's why I love these two movies so much. I recommend these films for all young people. Polly played by Keisha Knight Pulliam, can teach us all a lesson in determination and spirit. The singing is great, the dancing is great. The star studded cast was wonderfully picked and play great characters. This is a timeless classic I hope every child will see and learn from, but beware of price gougers I got this and the sequel from Disney Movie club and they both were half of what Amazon has them for sale. Enjoy the film!!!!!

If only people today had half the heart and spirit that this little girl had, we'd all be in a much better place.  This is a wonderful film that I have loved for years and waited forever to get on DVD.  Parents can watch it with their children and grandchildren because it's a great family film that all generations will love.  The singing and dancing (thanks to Debbie Allen's awesome choreography) is inspirational and downright fun to watch and sing along to.  Thank you Disney for finally putting it on DVD!  Folks, be sure to get both Polly and Polly: Comin' Home!!

I've been looking for this for years!!!!!  The ultimate classic!!!  Amazing cast and extraordinary performing!!!!  I wanted to be an extra in the movie as a kid!!!!!  So glad I have a copy in my possession !!!!

Hmm! I just realized I posted what should have been my review on this movie to the "Coming Home" movie. The "Coming Home" movie is really where the original "Pollyanna" doesn't go but I wish it had. Both ""Polly" and "Coming Home" are excellent family movies with lots of great music.

I've been hoping to get this video ever since I saw the movie on TV quite a few years ago. Wonderful movie and cast. Stayed very true to the original "Pollyanna" but with lots more singing which I thoroughly enjoy.

This story brings back memories of a time when community and togetherness were far more important than today.  Plus there are sweet songs that make one smile.
Nothing like having two kinds of the same movie! Nice little seasoning added to a very classic movie. NICELY DONE!

It was exactly what I hoped for & brought back so many fond childhood memories! It is a great family movie & the movie I purchased was in perfect condition! It was a great buy for my family!

It has great dancing and a great message .
I recommen getting this movie while it's still available.

Great family movie! I especially love the church dance scene. Great music, good plot and great acting. A real classic.

Polly is just the most wonderful movie.  Its song and dance and beautiful story simply lights up my life every time I watch it.  I believe it should be a movie staple in every home.  Debbie Allen did an amazing job with this movie and I'm so happy she did.  Throw out your old Pollyanna movie and buy this one and add it to your family collection immediately!
It was great to relive a wonderful memory that I shared with my children when they were young,  Thank you.

I can't believe this movie is so costly. This movie came out in the 80's my daughter was a baby I would put her in her baby swing and put this movie in the vhs it was the only way I could keep her quite while I cleaned the house. I've been looking for this move for a while now and found it but, will not pay almost $40 are more for this movie. I do want it but, I don't want it that bad!

Excellent movie about a young girl going to live with her old maid aunt. The music is fun and uplifting. Very positive portrayal of African Americans families during that time period. I would highly recommend this DVD.

I can't believe I didn't know Polly and Polly comin home has been out on DVD for so long.  Every couple of years I do a search for it to see if Disney actually wised up and released it on DVD.  I am so excited.  The only copy I have is one copied off of BET when I was a little girl.  Owning that tape is the only reason I have held onto my VCR, and believe me, the tape is not in the best of conditions.  I just ordered it from Disney Movie Club and am sooo anxious to get it in the mail.  I just love the way she "Bobty bobty bops"!!! Everyone should have a copy of this film in their collection.  It is the absolute best movie of all time.  I almost feel bad for only paying $1.99 because the lord knows I would have paid much more just to have it.

I used to what this movie with my sisters when we were little girls.
I just surprised them with the DVD version & we still love it.
Thanks.

I remember watching this video on the disney channel about 20 years ago when I was about 10. I liked it so much with all the catchy songs and dances and of course the cosby show was a hit at the time. I had to search for it because not a lot of people know it or carry it... I just bought it to make sure I have it in our DVD collection for our girls as they get older. I think it's a must have disney movie!!! I have always liked it more than the original Pollyanna! Go ahead and check it out. I think you and your family will love it.

I didn't enjoy this movie as much as the previous one.  I guess I wanted more from the movie.  I was looking forward to more insight on Polly.  The first movie was extremely better than the sequel, but it is still a all around good movie.
I seen this movie years ago and could never order it until now. Thank you for your prompt delivery.

i have always loved this movie and to have it on dvd is truely a great thing for me i love and when i say love i mean i love my childhood and the memories i have of it is what i wished michael jackson had but any ways back to the movie this movie is so sweet and it pulls at my heart strings from beginning to the end and i just want to share this great movie with every one in the world this real gets to the point of what matters and kiesha  does such an incredible job that i can't believe right now she is not working starring in blockbuster movies. this girl has a gift for acting and everyone knows how good she was as rudy on the cosby show. the songs are great and the music why is there not a soundtrack i love the songs and lyrics and everything about this movie .a+a+a+a+a polly will always earn a A++ love it forever and ever thank you for reading my review i appeciate it

I ordered Polly and Polly Coming Home. I was sent 2 DVDs of Polly. Upseting because that was not what I ordered. Normally when I place orders on Amazon I am able to track them, I was not able to do so t with this order for some reason.

Although not as inspirational as the original, this movie was well done and well acted.  Telling the story in more musical fashion was also very entertaining!
The message of giving, and sharing yourself and the gifts you've been given came through loud and clear!

I REMEMBER SEEING THIS WHEN I WAS YOUNGER AND I'VE NEVER SEEN IT AGAIN UNTIL I DECIDED TO LOOK FOR IT ON AMAZON. I ORDERED IT AS SOON AS I SEEN IT. I LOVE THIS MOVIE. I WATCH IT WITH MY GOD CHILDREN (AGES 2-8).
Beware! This is a sequel to the original Polly, although has all the original stars. I felt mis-informed about my purchase and now have to return the 2 copies.
This is a great movie.  I loved it years ago when I first saw it on TV

This movie is great!  I rememeber it from my childhood.  At 22, I don't remember much about it, and I've been looking for it for years.  Disney Movie Club has recently put this and it's sequeal Polly: Comin' Home on DVD.  There you won't pay half as much as these people are asking for it.

My children born in 1978, 1984 and 1985, grew up watching this movie after I taped it from it's original air date and they still love it.  I have been trying to find this movie and want to give it to them as a gift, they still know all the songs.
I was so glad when I finally found this movie. I had been looking for it for years!!!! I think its a great movie and I enjoyed watching it again! :)

Polly is a remake of the Pollyanna story with a wonderfully diverse twist.  Terrific acting and wonderful music.  The entertainment value is superb.  I never dreamed this was released on DVD and I was so happy to find it.  Most enjoyable for "kids of all ages".  Phylicia Rashad, Dorian Harewood, Celeste Holm and Keshia Knight Pulliam are a great combination telling a heartwarming story.

If you haven't ever heard or seen this movie, you are missing out. I remember watching this movie when I was younger with my family, now I am 25 with a family of my own and I just had to get it so I could enjoy it with my own family. This is a must see movie.

This movie is definitely a favorite of mine. The dancing, the singing, and the way that little girl brought people together. This movie came out when I was 13 years old. I cried during some parts of this movie when I was young, and I can admit it, I still cry now. I have always wondered why this movie was never put on tape or DVD. I am so glad that they finally have. I was only thinking about the movie, and a friend told me to check amazon. Well, I actually found video clips of it on YouTube first where I got to see my favorite scene. When Jimmie Bean and Polly were singing and dancing to Sweel Little Angel Eyes. I had memorized that song when i was young, and still know the words to it now. I used to repeat just that part of the movie. LOL. I don't mean to ramble on, I just really love this movie, and look forward to purchasing it, but not on Amazon. Thank you for all of your reviews, I will be going the Disney Movie club. As soon as I saw the price on Amazon, I thought you have got to be kidding me. I don't usually read reviews, but I am so glad I did today. Now, don't get me wrong, this movie is actually worth a lot more than that though. It is definitely a classic. I will be sharing this movie with my kids, and I hope everyone who knows about this movie does the same.

Polly is one of the best movies EVER made. I am 28, this came out in 1989, when I was 9 years old. I do have it on VHS, but the quality leaves a lot to be desired. Although I still watch it. I was considering buying it from Amazon, however $40 is a steep price to pay, and I have not seen it in stores as of yet. Thanks to a fellow member, I joined the Disney Movie Club tonight and also purchased it and Polly:Comin Home for $1.99 each. Thank Goodness. I can only remember fragments of Polly:Comin Home, but in no time I will know it by heart as well. I do know Polly from start to finish, word for word and every word of ALL the songs. Best movies Disney EVER put out.

Polly : The Wonderful World of Disneyyippee.this disney movie is a classic retelling of the story pollyanna. polly played by keisha knight pulliam shows she has a wonderful generous heart surely missed in todays world.the music is first rate along with the singing.i recomend this dvd to any disney or musical fan.an excellent disc.

Here is a great movie, with a message against  prejudice that is definitly not hidden. There are some nice songs and dance, and it was wonderful to have all the original characters back! I have been waiting for YEARS for them to put this movie on DVD! This is such a feel-good movie that I'm surprised it has taken them this long. Although it is not well known, this African-Americanized version of the story of Pollyanna is one of the most uplifting films Disney has made. It's light-hearted songs and emotional storyline make you feel, when you come out at the other end, that this movie has truly touched you. Plus, who can help but love the songs? From "Stand Up!" (my personal favorite...I still sing it around the house) to "Angel Eyes" to "Shine a Light", the music in this film is unforgettable. Worth getting just to relive the magic and the memories! I'm buying my copy today!

Polly has got to be one of my all time favorite movies.  I can recite the movie from beginnning to end just like "The Color Purple" and "Coming to America". BUT...I cannot believe Amazon has this movie on sale for almost $40.  I just ordered it for $1.99...yes $1.99 from the DisneyMovieClub. Of course I had to become a member.  But for this movie...it was worth it.

I have been waiting literally years for disney to put this title out and I am so happy they did. I remember watching this film Polly, and Polly: Comin' Home when I was a little girl and after watching it as a adult I still love it just as much. I am proud to show this movie to my daughter and other people who just enjoy quality black films. This film has class a class you rarely see these days in black entertainment that's why I love these two movies so much. I recommend these films for all young people. Polly played by Keisha Knight Pulliam, can teach us all a lesson in determination and spirit. The singing is great, the dancing is great. The star studded cast was wonderfully picked and play great characters. This is a timeless classic I hope every child will see and learn from, but beware of price gougers I got this and the sequel from Disney Movie club and they both were half of what Amazon has them for sale. Enjoy the film!!!!!

The singing and dancing (thanks to Debbie Allen's awesome choreography) is inspirational and downright fun to watch and sing along to.  Thank you Disney for finally putting it on DVD!  Folks, be sure to get both Polly and Polly: Comin' Home!!

It was exactly what I hoped for & brought back so many fond childhood memories! It is a great family movie & the movie I purchased was in perfect condition! It was a great buy for my family!

I remember this movie from my childhood.
It has great dancing and a great message .
I recommen getting this movie while it's still available.
I only gave this 3 stars because I really wanted Polly the move. A child would truly love this movie it's upbeat and wholesome.
Great family movie! I especially love the church dance scene. Great music, good plot and great acting. A real classic.
I was very impressed with how fast my order was processed and shipped.  The day I got the movie in the mail I watched it and it brought me back to my childhood years!
I was soo excited to get this DVD. Had a copy on VHS lent it to someone never got it back. So glad to have it on dvd really worth  it.
This movie is absolutely fantastic!!! Highly, highly recommend!  The music is just beautiful and it has a wonderful message.  Thanks.
This was a good family movie!!! I really enjoyed watching it with my mom and sister!!! We laughed cried sing
Been looking for this movie for years and happy to have found it again.  Arrived promptly and brand new just like promised.

I was very dissappointed with the DVD and felt ripped off because movie scenes were cut. I only kept the movie because I don't have the time to be sending it back. Good scenes cut but not the price. I say, tell people its not a full film.

Polly is just the most wonderful movie.  Its song and dance and beautiful story simply lights up my life every time I watch it.  I believe it should be a movie staple in every home.  Debbie Allen did an amazing job with this movie and I'm so happy she did.  Throw out your old Pollyanna movie and buy this one and add it to your family collection immediately!
It was great to relive a wonderful memory that I shared with my children when they were young,  Thank you.
Perfect condition. I opened and watched it as soon as I got it! It was my favorite movie as a child, so I'm happy to be able to watch it at any time as an adult. Thanks!
Arrived sooner than expected and was so HAPPY I was able to find this movie for my mother. THANK YOU! THANK YOU! THANK YOU!
This is exactly what I have been looking for, for a very long time. thank you for a smooth transaction and easy purchase :)

I can't believe this movie is so costly. This movie came out in the 80's my daughter was a baby I would put her in her baby swing and put this movie in the vhs it was the only way I could keep her quite while I cleaned the house. I've been looking for this move for a while now and found it but, will not pay almost $40 are more for this movie. I do want it but, I don't want it that bad!

Excellent movie about a young girl going to live with her old maid aunt. The music is fun and uplifting. Very positive portrayal of African Americans families during that time period. I would highly recommend this DVD.

I can't believe I didn't know Polly and Polly comin home has been out on DVD for so long.  Every couple of years I do a search for it to see if Disney actually wised up and released it on DVD.  I am so excited.  The only copy I have is one copied off of BET when I was a little girl.  Owning that tape is the only reason I have held onto my VCR, and believe me, the tape is not in the best of conditions.  I just ordered it from Disney Movie Club and am sooo anxious to get it in the mail.  I just love the way she "Bobty bobty bops"!!! Everyone should have a copy of this film in their collection.  It is the absolute best movie of all time.  I almost feel bad for only paying $1.99 because the lord knows I would have paid much more just to have it.

I remember watching this video on the disney channel about 20 years ago when I was about 10. I liked it so much with all the catchy songs and dances and of course the cosby show was a hit at the time. I had to search for it because not a lot of people know it or carry it... I just bought it to make sure I have it in our DVD collection for our girls as they get older. I think it's a must have disney movie!!! I have always liked it more than the original Pollyanna! Go ahead and check it out. I think you and your family will love it.

I didn't enjoy this movie as much as the previous one.  I guess I wanted more from the movie.  I was looking forward to more insight on Polly.  The first movie was extremely better than the sequel, but it is still a all around good movie.
I seen this movie years ago and could never order it until now. Thank you for your prompt delivery.

i have always loved this movie and to have it on dvd is truely a great thing for me i love and when i say love i mean i love my childhood and the memories i have of it is what i wished michael jackson had but any ways back to the movie this movie is so sweet and it pulls at my heart strings from beginning to the end and i just want to share this great movie with every one in the world this real gets to the point of what matters and kiesha  does such an incredible job that i can't believe right now she is not working starring in blockbuster movies. this girl has a gift for acting and everyone knows how good she was as rudy on the cosby show. the songs are great and the music why is there not a soundtrack i love the songs and lyrics and everything about this movie .a+a+a+a+a polly will always earn a A++ love it forever and ever thank you for reading my review i appeciate it

I ordered Polly and Polly Coming Home. I was sent 2 DVDs of Polly. Upseting because that was not what I ordered. Normally when I place orders on Amazon I am able to track them, I was not able to do so t with this order for some reason.

Although not as inspirational as the original, this movie was well done and well acted.  Telling the story in more musical fashion was also very entertaining!
The message of giving, and sharing yourself and the gifts you've been given came through loud and clear!

I REMEMBER SEEING THIS WHEN I WAS YOUNGER AND I'VE NEVER SEEN IT AGAIN UNTIL I DECIDED TO LOOK FOR IT ON AMAZON. I ORDERED IT AS SOON AS I SEEN IT. I LOVE THIS MOVIE. I WATCH IT WITH MY GOD CHILDREN (AGES 2-8).
Beware! This is a sequel to the original Polly, although has all the original stars. I felt mis-informed about my purchase and now have to return the 2 copies.
This is a great movie.  I loved it years ago when I first saw it on TV

This movie is great!  I rememeber it from my childhood.  At 22, I don't remember much about it, and I've been looking for it for years.  Disney Movie Club has recently put this and it's sequeal Polly: Comin' Home on DVD.  There you won't pay half as much as these people are asking for it.

My children born in 1978, 1984 and 1985, grew up watching this movie after I taped it from it's original air date and they still love it.  I have been trying to find this movie and want to give it to them as a gift, they still know all the songs.
I was so glad when I finally found this movie. I had been looking for it for years!!!! I think its a great movie and I enjoyed watching it again! :)

Polly is a remake of the Pollyanna story with a wonderfully diverse twist.  Terrific acting and wonderful music.  The entertainment value is superb.  I never dreamed this was released on DVD and I was so happy to find it.  Most enjoyable for "kids of all ages".  Phylicia Rashad, Dorian Harewood, Celeste Holm and Keshia Knight Pulliam are a great combination telling a heartwarming story.

If you haven't ever heard or seen this movie, you are missing out. I remember watching this movie when I was younger with my family, now I am 25 with a family of my own and I just had to get it so I could enjoy it with my own family. This is a must see movie.

This movie is definitely a favorite of mine. The dancing, the singing, and the way that little girl brought people together. This movie came out when I was 13 years old. I cried during some parts of this movie when I was young, and I can admit it, I still cry now. I have always wondered why this movie was never put on tape or DVD. I am so glad that they finally have. I was only thinking about the movie, and a friend told me to check amazon. Well, I actually found video clips of it on YouTube first where I got to see my favorite scene. When Jimmie Bean and Polly were singing and dancing to Sweel Little Angel Eyes. I had memorized that song when i was young, and still know the words to it now. I used to repeat just that part of the movie. LOL. I don't mean to ramble on, I just really love this movie, and look forward to purchasing it, but not on Amazon. Thank you for all of your reviews, I will be going the Disney Movie club. As soon as I saw the price on Amazon, I thought you have got to be kidding me. I don't usually read reviews, but I am so glad I did today. Now, don't get me wrong, this movie is actually worth a lot more than that though. It is definitely a classic. I will be sharing this movie with my kids, and I hope everyone who knows about this movie does the same.

Polly is one of the best movies EVER made. I am 28, this came out in 1989, when I was 9 years old. I do have it on VHS, but the quality leaves a lot to be desired. Although I still watch it. I was considering buying it from Amazon, however $40 is a steep price to pay, and I have not seen it in stores as of yet. Thanks to a fellow member, I joined the Disney Movie Club tonight and also purchased it and Polly:Comin Home for $1.99 each. Thank Goodness. I can only remember fragments of Polly:Comin Home, but in no time I will know it by heart as well. I do know Polly from start to finish, word for word and every word of ALL the songs. Best movies Disney EVER put out.

Love this ... Pulliam and Rashad are awesome.
Loved this movie and watched it all the time!!!! I was not happy about the price;however, I am so glad I added this to my collection. So ridiculously good.

The Wonderful World of Disney first aired this film in 1989 when my daughter was 8 years old.  Because we taped it, she and I were able to watch it many times together & she continued to watch it until the video became so fragile that splicing was no longer an option.  Last year she asked for the movie for Christmas, but I was not able to locate it in time.  But locate it I did so it was included in her gifts this year.  Her message after plugging it into the DVD player indicated a smile on her face extending from ear to ear!  I knew exactly how she looked because I had enjoyed her expression so many times through the years.  Feeling blessed that I could help bring that back for her.  Pricey, yes, but the vision of her smile is priceless and one of my best "glad things"!!!!!
I love this movie.
